# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **noiseLevel**: The amount of noise reduction.
- **sharpness**: The sharpness of the final image.

items.description: The sharpness of the final image.
items.name: sharpness
